title: Viki: Stream Asian TV Shows, Movies, and Kdramas
description:
Watch all your favorite subtitled dramas, movies, and TV shows from Korea, Mainland China, Taiwan, and Japan anytime, anywhere, with Viki. Stream for free or subscribe to Viki Pass for an awesome HD experience, completely ad-free.
Our ever-growing collection of award-winning series, movies, variety shows, music performances, and more, is sure to have something for everyone. And with the mobile app, you can enjoy all your favorites both at home and on the go.
VIKI OFFERS
Subtitles:
Unlimited access to thousands of subtitled shows and movies.
Korean Dramas:
Watch Korea’s most popular shows, including Hotel Del Luna, What’s Wrong With Secretary Kim?, and Melting Me Softly. Enjoy an extensive library of timeless classics that include all your favorites, such as Boys Over Flowers, Heirs, While You Were Sleeping, and Descendants of the Sun.
Mainland Chinese Dramas:
Watch Mainland China’s most popular drama series, including Nirvana in Fire, Go Go Squid!, Eternal Love, Princess Agents, Scarlet Heart, and Legend of Fuyao.
Taiwanese Dramas:
Watch Taiwan’s most popular shows, including HIStory3, Before We Get Married, Hello Again!, and Behind Your Smile.
Japanese Dramas:
Watch Japan’s most popular dramas, including You’re My Pet, Mischievous Kiss, In Time With You, and Hakuouki SSL.
Movies:
Watch all your favorite films, including The Beauty Inside, A Werewolf Boy, The Man From Nowhere, The Outlaws, The Dude in Me, and more.
Kpop:
Watch Korea’s Top Idol Groups, such as BTS, Blackpink, Twice, Monsta X, GOT7, and more, in all your favorite variety shows, dramas, and award shows.
Streaming Players and TV:
Rakuten Viki is available on Roku, AndroidTV, AppleTV, Google Chromecast, and FireTV.
KOCOWA:
Access KOCOWA with Viki’s Premium Plan to watch content from KBS, SBS, and MBC.
Learn Mode:
Use the feature on Viki’s player to learn multiple languages, including Korean, Chinese, Japanese, etc.
Legal Streaming:
Rakuten Viki legally licenses all of its content. No need to worry about viruses.
Try Viki Pass free for 7 days first! Check out the plans at https://www.viki.com/pass.
Questions, comments or suggestions? Reach us at mobile@viki.com.
Qualified Contributors (QC) get to watch for free. Learn how you can become a QC at www.viki.com/community.
Terms of Use: https://www.viki.com/terms_of_use
Privacy Policy: https://www.viki.com/privacy
